projects.name: Efficient Transformer-Based Brain Tumor Segmentation
projects.description: Developed a streamlined ensemble model for brain tumor segmentation from MRI scans by integrating U-Net and Vision Transformer (U-ViT) architectures across multiple anatomical planes.
highlights: Designed a modular U-ViT model combining convolutional and transformer-based components for improved contextual representation.
Implemented a simplified single-pass ensemble using axial, sagittal, and coronal orientations with voxel-wise fusion.
Introduced TF-IDF inspired class weighting and composite loss functions (Dice, Cross-Entropy, Hausdorff distance) to address class imbalance and boundary accuracy.
Evaluated on BraTS21 dataset, achieving superior segmentation accuracy compared to baseline U-Net ensembles.

projects.name: Quadratic Funding Platform
projects.description: Developed a production-ready quadratic funding system using ink! smart contracts, integrated with a React/TypeScript frontend and Polkadot wallet for real-time funding rounds and contributions.
highlights: Implemented a Capital-Constrained Quadratic Funding (CQF) smart contract in ink! with overflow-safe U256 arithmetic and direct wallet-to-wallet transfers.
Designed core data structures for projects, rounds, and contributions, with real-time quadratic funding calculations and privacy-preserving contributor stats.
Integrated smart contract with React frontend via Polkadot.js, enabling users to connect wallets, create initiatives, and contribute funds with quadratic weighting.
Built an admin dashboard for managing matching pools, funding rounds, and project eligibility, with secure contract deployment workflows.
Deployed and tested the system on Substrate-based networks (Westend, Rococo, POP), including wallet integration and event-driven UI updates.

projects.name: Cross-Chain Swap Protocol Integration between EVM and non-EVM Chains
projects.description: Implemented the Tron-side infrastructure and contracts for a decentralized, intent-based cross-chain swap system integrated with 1inch Fusion+. Extended the project with Ethereum contracts and a front-end interface.
highlights: Developed minimal HTLC escrow contracts on Tron for TRX and TRC-20 tokens, enabling hashlock and timelock logic.
Implemented Dutch auction parameters, safety deposits, and off-chain relayer/resolver coordination for secure swaps.
Debugged and refined contract deployment, value transfer, and secret/hash handling across multiple iterations.
Designed modular architecture with clear documentation, ASCII diagrams, and testing scripts for maintainability.
Integrated Ethereum-side contracts and built a front-end interface to support user interactions and order broadcasting.
